General.Name: Red White & Bloom Brands Inc
General.Description: Red White & Bloom Brands Inc. manufactures, processes, and distributes cannabis products and accessories primarily in Michigan, California, and Florida. The company operates through Retail and Distribution segments. It also sells non-THC branded products, as well as branded and third-party cannabis products and accessories to the adult-use and medical markets. The company operates licensed adult-use and medical retail dispensaries. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2

2.Name: Mr. Johannes Petrus Matheus van der Linde CPA, CA
